my.example.code

Class UniqueVersionsDataCenterInstances

  • java.lang.Object
    • my.example.code.UniqueVersionsDataCenterInstances
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataCenterInstances

    public class UniqueVersionsDataCenterInstances
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataCenterInstances
    Implements a set of behaviors used for storing data center capacity data and calculating the usable machine groups (M) the data describes. The strategy used by this implementation is to use UniqueVersionsDataSubsetGroup instances for the DataSubsetGroup behaviors.

    Since:
    6/11/2013
    Author:
    David Williams (david.k.williams@gmail.com)

        public void addInstance(int machineGroupIndex,

        Specified by:
        addInstance in interface DataCenterInstances
        Parameters:
        machineGroupIndex - the machine group index (0 based) for this data subset machine instance

        version - the version for this data subset

      • calculateTotalUsableMachineGroups

        public int calculateTotalUsableMachineGroups()

        Calculates the number of machine groups containing a set of matching data subset versions using the managed data. These represent a complete set of data subsets which together can server 100 requests per second.

        Specified by:
        calculateTotalUsableMachineGroups in interface DataCenterInstances
        Returns:
        the number of machine groups containing a set of matching data subset versions
